frame.name: Successful_action
frame.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> action by which a deprofiled agent (the <fen>Protagonist</fen>) has attempted to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>, is finished and the actual outcome of the <fen>Means</fen> action has been resolved, so that it either specifically matches the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s intent (e.g. <ment>success</ment>) or does not match it (e.g. <ment>failure</ment>). In an alternative construal, an <fen>Instrument</fen> stands for the <fen>Means</fen> action that the deprofiled agent undertakes in order to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex><fex name="cau">Why</fex> <fex name="mea">our bid</fex> <m>was</m> <t>successful</t>. <fex name="goa">DNI</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="mea">Your attempt to unsubscribe</fex> <m>was</m> <t>unsuccessful</t>, please try again later. <fex name="goa">DNI</fex></ex> <ex> Well I did end up replacing the old co axial cables with new monster ones and <fex name="mea">it</fex> <t>did</t> <t>the</t> <t>trick</t>. <fex name="goa">DNI</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="ins">The hammer</fex> <t>did</t> <t>it</t>, not a scratch or dent in the parts as they came apart <fex name="goa">DNI</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Means">What</fex> has <t>failed</t> <fex name="Place">in Palestine</fex>, will fail in Iraq. <fex name="Goal">DNI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The action that the agent undertakes to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex><fex name="mea">His daring, almost reckless, move</fex> <t>succeeded</t> and he lived to fight another day.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the agent attempts to achieve by performing the <fen>Means</fen> action.
<ex>This move <t>succeeded</t> <fex name="goa">in securing trade concessions and the release of imprisoned American sailors</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition:
<def-root> An entity directed by the agent as part of the <fen>Means</fen> action in order to accomplish the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex> All of my usual source books seemed incomplete, but <fex name="ins">your website</fex> <t>did</t> <t>the</t> <t>trick</t>!</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The place where <fen>Means</fen> action succeeds or fails.
<ex>A similar strategy, perhaps even bloodier, <t>did</t> <t>the</t> <t>trick</t> <fex name="pla">in El Salvador</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt succeeds or fails
<ex> But it <t>did</t> <t>the</t> <t>trick</t> <fex name="tim">at the time</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Circumstances</fen> encodes a setting, often temporal or spatial, within which the successful action expressed by the target takes place.
<ex>The installation <t>failed</t> <fex name="cir">under FreeBSD 5.2.1.</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the deprofiled individual who makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen> by performing the <fen>Means</fen> action, which may involve using an <fen>Instrument</fen>.
<ex>Download also <t>failed</t> <fex name="pro">for me</fex> on both March and May issues. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an attempt involving a particular <fen>Means</fen> or <fen>Instrument</fen> succeeds.
<ex> A 1000 pf cap <fex name="Degree">almost completely</fex> <t>did</t> <t>the</t> <t>trick</t> so I went bigger with what happened to be handy</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition:
<def-root>A participant function of an <fen>Instrument</fen> or <fen>Means</fen> in a particular event or in events of a particular kind.
<ex>The machine was <t>successful</t> <fex name="rol">as a reconnaissance vehicle</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root> The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the success or failure logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the success or failure, but not in all cases.
<ex> The attempt <t>failed</t> <fex name="exp">because of John's repeated interference.</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE denotes an event or state of affairs that occurs or holds at a time that includes the time during which the success or failure reported by the target occurs and of which the success or failure is taken to be a part
<ex>This argument <t>succeeded</t> <fex name="con">in Waltons-Morse v Dorrington where a non-smoking secretary claimed she was forced to work in a smoke-filled office</fex>. </ex></def-root>
